links.*: Of the Coming of the Elves and the Captivity of Melkor

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|Year of the Trees 1|Year of the Trees 1000|Year of the Trees 1050|Year of the Trees 1080|Year of the Trees 1085|Year of the Trees 1086|Year of the Trees 1090}}

* [[Varda]] finishes forming constellations with the [[Valacirca]]. She hangs this in the north as a threat to [[Morgoth|Melkor]].<ref name=Elves>{{MR|P2e}}, entry 1050, §§ 36-40, pp. 71-2</ref><ref name=Quenta>{{S|Captivity}}</ref>
* The [[Elves]] [[Awakening of the Elves|awake]] in [[Cuiviénen]], and the first thing seen by them are the [[stars]].<ref name=Elves/><ref name=Quenta/><ref>{{WJ|One}}, entry "VY 1050", §3, p. 5</ref> They shout ''ele!'' ("behold!"), the first word the first Elves ever spoke.<ref>{{WJ|A}}, p. 360</ref> The [[Eru-begotten|Firstborn]] are numbering 144 in total and led by three [[Elf-fathers]]: [[Imin]] lord of the [[Minyar]], [[Tata]] lord of the [[Tatyar]], and [[Enel]] lord of the [[Nelyar]].<ref>{{WJ|Appendix}}, p. 420-4</ref>
* [[Melian]] ascends [[Taniquetil]] to see the stars, but she then desires to see [[Middle-earth]] and leaves [[Valinor]] for [[Beleriand]].<ref name=Elves/><ref>{{S|Thingol}}</ref>
*The [[First Age]] begins.<ref>{{MR|P2a}}, §10, p. 51</ref><ref>{{NM|P1xvii}}, p. 123: "''The [[First Age]] begins with the [[Awakening of the Elves|Awaking]] ''[of the [[Elves]]]'' and ends with the [[War of Wrath|Downfall of Angband]].''"</ref><ref>{{LE|131}}: "''… First Age, from the coming of the Eldar to its end with overthrow of Morgoth-melkor, the first Dark Lord.''"</ref><ref>{{HM|Guide}}, entry "First Age", p. 184</ref>
